definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: In this work, we use the technology of DC arc-discharge to grow carbon nanotubes.
sentences.chinese: 在本論文中，以電弧放電法成長奈米碳管。

sentences.english: The high pressure and arc will rely on the arc, flame cutting is not appear the arc.
sentences.chinese: 而弧壓調高要依賴電弧，火焰切割是不出現電弧的。

sentences.english: The high pressure and arc will rely on the arc, flame cutting is not appear the arc.
sentences.chinese: 而弧壓調高要依賴電弧，火焰切割是不出現電弧的。

sentences.english: Electrode for arc welding consists of the core and the coat.
sentences.chinese: 電弧焊的焊條是由焊芯和藥皮兩個部分組成的。

sentences.english: A new detecting method for lack of manual weld is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種對手工電弧焊進行漏焊檢測的新方法。

sentences.english: Service time of covers of arc furnaces made by way of casting is more than 150 heats.
sentences.chinese: 澆注成型的電弧爐蓋，單蓋壽命在150爐次以上。

sentences.english: The arc would lean if the blowtorch deviated from the weld seam.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲不對中情況下，電弧傾斜係數增大。

sentences.english: The negative feedback of arc voltage makes the MIG welding machine to output constant-voltage external characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 電弧電壓負反饋使焊機獲得平外特性輸出。

sentences.english: Inert gas arc weld the spring strut mount.
sentences.chinese: 惰性氣體電弧焊減震器支座。

sentences.english: The most widely used industrial welding method is arc welding.
sentences.chinese: 電弧焊是工業上最常用的燒焊方法。

sentences.english: If an arc forms, gas accumulation is rapid, and oil flows rapidly into the conservator.
sentences.chinese: 電弧形成時，氣體快速積累，油迅速流入油枕中。

sentences.english: Arc furnace of superhigh power has great influence on the electric net-work.
sentences.chinese: 超高功率電弧爐對電網的影響較大。

sentences.english: Elevated temperature method is used to measure the thermal power and electrical properties of welding arc.
sentences.chinese: 採用溫升法測量了電弧的熱功率和靜特性。

sentences.english: The operation of bubbly slag submerged - arc is a new technology of electric arc furnace smelt.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫渣埋弧操作是電弧爐鍊鋼的一項新技術。

sentences.english: Perhaps I need to pull apart another SCR and try the arc welding approach.
sentences.chinese: 也許我需要把除了另一可控硅和審判電弧焊接的辦法。

sentences.english: Is used as an ordinary arc soldering power source, safely, reliable and easy to use.
sentences.chinese: 一種普通的電弧焊接電源，安全可靠，易於使用。

extraordinary strength/super strong/strong as an ox
lit. to drive a duck onto a perch (idiom)/fig. to push sb to do sth way beyond their ability

to puff up/to swell up/to inflate/to blow air into sth/(fig.) to encourage/to support
